headline: Louisiana Crawfish Bisque
name: Louisiana Crawfish Bisque
description: This Louisiana crawfish bisque is a family-favorite recipe that's a hearty, creamy soup packed with crawfish tails, corn, and lots of Creole flavor.
recipeIngredient: 2 (10.5 ounce) cans cream of potato soup
1 (10.5 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup
2 tablespoons Creole seasoning (such as Tony Chachere's®), or more to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat. Cook and stir onion and green onion in hot butter until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add crawfish tails, condensed soups, canned corns, and cream cheese; cook, stirring often, until cream cheese melts and ingredients are well combined, about 5 minutes.
Stir in half-and-half and Creole seasoning; season with salt and black pepper. Cook until hot, about 15 minutes.
